Translations.Text: Mi zzint wallen nnsen ar at tmes, ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Ur a$ Ppara s agdud imednas
Ad siwlen at iqacucen i irgazen, ssnen ten ar uuiffat nnsen. Ad inin: "acu i wen d issuli wayen tjemaam akked wayen tzuxxem
Day wigi d wid i$ef teggulem, ar ur sen ippak Oebbi aeunu? "Kecmet Loennet, ur teppagwadem, ur t$weblem
At tmes ad siwlen i at Loennet: "smiret ed fellane$ aman, ne$ seg wayen is ikwen I$at Oebbi". Ad inin: "Oebbi, s tidep, Igdel iten i ijehliyen
wid irran ddin nnsen d zzhu, d urar, u t$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit". Ihi, assa, a ten Neppu, akken ppun timlilit n wass nnsen agi, u nekoen issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nusa ten id s Tezmamt, Nfeuuel ip s tussna. D nnhaya, d aeunu i ugdud iumnen

Day la poaoun kan veoou s? Ass n tisin n veoou s, ad inin wid illan, iu$ leal, ppun p: "ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep. Day nesaa imcafaen ara $ icafaen, ne$ ad a$ rren, a nexdem ayen mgirrden wayen nxeddem"? Ni$ sxeuoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

S tidep, Mass nnwen d Oebbi. Ixelq ed tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan, sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld. Ip$ummu iv s wass, ip$awalen $uoes. Iiij, aggur, akked yitran unzen i lameo iS. Day macci ineS lxelq akked lameo? D Asaadi Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Naaret Mass nnwen, s wannuz, di tbavnit. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Ur ssefsadet di tmurt deffir useeoet is. Naaoet eP, s tugwdi d usirem. Aeunu n Oebbi, s tidep, ar tama n lauuam

D Neppa id Ippaznen avu, d abecceo s ueunu S. Alamma, ma ibbub ed asigna aeayan, Nenheo it ar tmurt immuten. Nesse$li d syis aman. Nessuffe$ ed yissen yal ppemoa. Akka ay d Nessuffu$ lmeggtin, amendeo ma d tesmektim
Di tmurt laali, teff$en d im$an is, ma Irad Oebbi. Di tin icemten, teff$en d kan d iweqweqen. Akka ay Nepbeggin issekniyen i ugdud isnemmiren
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Nek ugade$ fellawen aaaqeb, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan imvebboen n ugdud is: "$uone$, s tidep, aql ak di ttelfan n uuee
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur illi dgi ttelfan. Maca nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw, a kwen neuee$. Ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uo Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi, iwakken a peezzbem, amar fellawen aeunu
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Nitni, s tidep, d agdud ader$al
